title: Post Game: ‘This could take months’
description: Chuck talks about his interviews with Vermont senator Bernie Sanders and White House Senior Adviser Cedric Richmond, plus his discussion about Facebook’s troubles. Sarah Blackwill, senior broadcast producer at Meet the Press.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
